title: Did President Trump deliver his speech from "the legal blonde "?
subtitle: The clippings from the headline given by Trump were compared with the clippings from the scene in Reese Witherspoon.
author: David Emery
vclaim: President Trump delivered an introductory statement at the University of Liberty in May 2017, which had notable similarities with one of Reese Witherspoon's character in the film "Legal Blonde."
